title: Primal Rage (1988, Horror) by Vittorio Rambaldi | with Patrick Lowe, Cheryl Arutt | Movie

sources.title: Primal Rage (1988, Horror) by Vittorio Rambaldi | with Patrick Lowe, Cheryl Arutt | Movie
sources.description:
There's a new party animal on campus. She'll bring out the beast in you.
A scientist at a Florida University accidentally creates a "rage virus" while conducting experiments to restore dead brain tissue in baboons. The virus soon spreads.

Original title: Rage - Furia primitiva (1988)
This film is subtitled in many language options.

Watch the uncensored Members Only version: https://youtu.be/GnzpF5zbVPE


Director: Vittorio Rambaldi
Writers: Umberto Lenzi, James Justice
Stars: Patrick Lowe, Cheryl Arutt, Sarah Buxton
Genres: Horror, Sci-Fi, Thriller, B-Movie


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
03:02 Investigative journalist Sam Nash uncovers a scandal involving a stolen car and a suspected arsonist.
07:29 Breakthrough in medical research on brain cell regeneration and ethical dilemmas.
13:01 A chaotic sequence of events unfolds in a laboratory, involving monkeys, illegal activities, and a high IQ individual.
22:10 A chaotic sequence of events involving a mysterious disappearance, a prank gone wrong, and a confrontation between characters.
30:02 Interview with a military family member leads to discussions about personal backgrounds, hobbies, and family secrets.
37:43 A series of events unfold involving a mysterious protein synthesis experiment and a missing person.
51:37 A journalist confesses to killing Duffy, leading to a series of events involving a hospital, a mysterious drug, and a tragic outcome.
1:07:29 A medical breakthrough leads to unexpected consequences and a dangerous encounter at a mental hospital.
1:17:40 A passionate plea for love and forgiveness is expressed through heartfelt lyrics and dance.
